original_title: Target You! Cold War Educational Films
overview: 9 bizarre civil defense and anti-Communist short films from the '50s and '60s. Short films: 1. What Is Communism? 2. Duck And Cover 3. Our Cities Must Fight 4. Warning Red 5. Bombproof 6. Target You 7. Information Program Within Public Shelters 8. Occupying A Public Shelter 9. Town Of The Times
title: Target You! Cold War Educational Films
